original_text: And I will bring them, and they shall dwell in the midst of Jerusalem: and they shall be my people, and I will be their God, in truth and in righteousness.
korean_text: 인도하여다가 예루살렘 가운데에 거주하게 하리니 그들은 내 백성이 되고 나는 진리와 공의로 그들의 하나님이 되리라

sentences.original_text: and they shall dwell in the midst of Jerusalem
and they shall be my people
and I will be their God
